text: <@U6W3H6YN8> Hey Will this is Ashleigh, we where on the call with you and I mentioned the design manager having a white screen, it’s still happening
Hey <@UFB4AP14H>! Could you DM me the link to where this is happening, please? Happy to look into whats going on

So, it looks like after clearing all my cookies/ site data as well as cache it is  no longer going to a white screen I think the cookies and site data being cleared fixed this as just clearing cache didn’t do anything.
:thumbsup: next time this happens, send along your local storage data and we can look into what is going on there
is the local storage file that need called a har file by any chance?

<@U6W3H6YN8>, thank you for meeting with us again, it was great talking with you all you guys, is it possible you provide me all the names of your team members (like the ones in the room, and on the call from your team and their roles)

Here is our team:
Brian Young - Creative Technology Directory
Chris Abplanalp - Sr. Web Developer
Doug Osborne - Sr. Web Developer
Dominik Goralczyk - Web Developer
Ashleigh Gvero - Web Developer
Hey Ashleigh, local storage can be found in the "Application" tab of the Chrome Developer tools. If this pops up again, feel free to reach out before clearing the data and we can take a look
